changeSet.author: martin.jovanovski
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO acm_exemption_statute (cm_parent_object_id, cm_parent_object_type, cm_exemption_statute, cm_exemption_status, cm_exemption_created, cm_exemption_creator, cm_file_id, cm_file_version, cm_manually_flag) SELECT cm_parent_object_id, cm_parent_object_type, cm_exemption_statute, cm_exemption_status, cm_exemption_created, cm_exemption_creator, cm_file_id, cm_file_version, cm_manually_flag FROM acm_exemption_code WHERE cm_exemption_statute IS NOT NULL
